::Surgital::

Surgital tried to fight Ice's mind lock on his.  He was down =
on his knees, which made small craters in the ground, and holding his fists=
, trying to shake it off.  
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWO=
LF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, October 12, 2001 12:57 P=
M
  Subject: Another female loseing her mind.


  Surgitals flashback was s=
ent into Ices mind, she saw everything as if it was happening to her. "It's=
 not happening to me, it's not me." she kept telling herself as blade after=
 blade struck her mental form. Trying desperately to control her thoughts s=
he shouted another command. "SEPERATE"

  Her owl form spun out of control =
as she hit the ground. Seeing that form cut and beaten she transformed to h=
er mutant robot mode. Her bearlike paws covered her head as a migrane began=
 to form. She tried to be the good leader but her sanity would soon fade if=
 her mind didn't leave Surgital. 
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    Fro=
m: Samir Duran 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, October =
09, 2001 4:15 PM
    Subject: The Cybers Will Never Rule since Tankor sucks=
 when it comes to spelling and using capitals


    ::Triggerhappy/Skullgri=
n/Jume/Whee/Surgital::

    Triggerhappy's finger moved to pull the trigger=
.  Hell Drak's eyes were closed tight, waiting for death.  But nothing happ=
ened.  She opened her eyes.  Triggerhappy was hit, and fell to his knees, m=
outh wide open, shocked, and in pain.  

    "You....." Triggerhappy stoppe=
d to gasped for air, "Pile of......."

    Triggerhappy fell down on his fa=
ce, so he was laying on the ground.  Where his face was, a puddle of mechfl=
uid appeared, and mechfluids started spilling from where he had been hit.  =
The punctures in his metal started to turn into cracks, and mechfluid came =
out.

    Skullgrin, Jume, and Whee watched as Triggerhappy had been suppos=
edly defeated.

    "NO!  MY DECEPTIPAL!" Skullgrin shouted.

    Skullgrin=
 transformed into Pretender mode, and had his massive, freaky club.  He ran=
 at AzureBlade and threw a lethal blow to AzureBlade's head.  Jume and Whee=
 fired at AzureBlade.

    "No!  Watch out!" Hell Drak yelled.

    A light=
 came into her optics, and then she quickly got up and dove at AzureBlade, =
trying to take him down, but out of the way of damage...
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~
    Surgital suddenly felt something from Ice.  The mind thing.  Pain.  
=

    "No........not this.......I thought I had forgot about this!" Surgital=
 said, but which Bodicon was saying it, nobody knew.

    Surgital didn't f=
eel physical pain, but a flashback showed up, and would be visible in the m=
inds of both Ice and all the Bodicons.  It was a flashback from Decapitron!=
  

    Flashback:  Decapitron was tied to a conveyer belt, with some sort =
of energon rope.  He was horrified, and was screaming for help.  Then, he w=
ent forward, and a bunch of saws and stuff came down!  They started cutting=
 at Decapitron.  All he could do was scream in sheer pain.  Each saw blade =
had the Autobot symbol engraved on it.  Decapitron, still tied onto the con=
veyer belt, was now heading into a large box thing.  On the way, a heavy th=
ing with an Autobot symbol came down and sort of crushed Decapitron's head.=
  Then, Decapitron went into the box thing, which also had an Autobot symbo=
l, and then the doors of the box shut, and then Decapitron was stuck, and h=
e was getting beaten and battered.  After the 10 minute torture process was=
 done in the box, Decapitron kept going.  Mechfluid and oil and stuff were =
pouring like mad, and he was mangled and dislocated and stuff.  Finally, he=
 was at the end, and was dumped off of the conveyer belt and onto the groun=
d.  The last thing he had seen back then when that happened, was Autobots a=
round him, laughing sinisterly with evil eyes and faces.  
    *Flashback E=
nds*

    Surgital was still...
